Name: nya-alhajiyusufmuha
Author: Al Haji Yusuf Muhammad Kanyamula
Source: http://goodwordbooks.com/, Goodword Books, Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa

Translations.Text: Ta Ha
Ife sitidavumbulutse Korani ino kwa iwe ndi cholinga choti uvutike
Koma kuti chikhale chilangizo kwa anthu oopa Mulungu
Ndi chivumbulutso chochokera kwa Iye amene adalenga dziko lapansi ndi kumwamba kwenikweniko
Mwini chisoni chosatha amene adaoneka ali pamwamba pa Mpando wa Chifumu
Zake ndi zonse zimene zili kumwamba ndi pa dziko lapansi ndi zonse zimene zimakhala m’menemo ndiponso zimene zili pansi pa nthaka
Ngati iwe utchula mawu mokweza, ndithudi Iye amadziwa chinsinsi ndiponso chobisika
Mulungu! Kulibe wina wopembedzedwa mwachoonadi koma Iye yekha. Ake ndi mayina okongola
Kodi udamva za mbiri ya Mose
Pamene iye adaona moto adawauza abale ake kuti, “Dikirani! Ndithudi ine ndaona moto. Mwina ndikubweretserani muuni kuti ndipeze ulangizi pa motopo.”
Pamene iye adafika pafupi ndi moto, adaitanidwa pomutchula dzina lake kuti, “Oh Mose!”
“Ndithudi, Ine ndine Ambuye wako! Motero chotsa nsapato zako. Ndithudi iwe uli m’dambo lodalitsika la Tuwa.”
“Ndipo Ine ndakusankha iwe. Kotero mvetsera chimene chikuvumbulutsidwa kwa iwe.”
Ndithudi Ine ndine Mulungu. Palibe wina wopembedzedwa mwachoonadi koma Ine ndekha motero ndipembedze Ine ndipo pitiriza mapemphero pondikumbukira Ine.”
“Ndithudi ola lili nkudza ndipo cholinga changa ndi kulibisa kuti mzimu ulionse udzalipidwe malipiro molingana ndi ntchito zake.”
“Ndipo usalole kuti munthu amene sakhulupirira za olali ndipo yemwe amachita zimene mtima wake umafuna kuti akusocheretse chifukwa ukhoza kuonongeka.”
“Kodi ndi chiyani chimene chili m’dzanja lako la manja iwe Mose?”
Iye adati, “Iyi ndi ndodo yanga, ndi iyoyi ine ndimayedzamira ndipo ndimagwetsera masamba akudya nyama zanga. Imeneyi imandithandiza pa ntchito zambiri kuonjezera pa zimenezi.”
Mulungu adati, “Ndodoyo iponye pansi iwe Mose.”
Mose adaiponya pansi, ndipo taonani! Iyo idasanduka njoka yoyenda mwaliwiro
Mulungu adati, “Igwire ndipo usachite mantha ayi. Ife tidzaibwezera monga momwe idalili poyamba.”
“Tsopano kanikiza dzanja lako m’khwapa mwako. Ilo lidzasanduka loyera lopanda matenda ngati chizindikiro china.”
“Kuti tikusonyeze zizindikiro zathu zazikulu.”
“Pita kwa Farawo! Ndithudi iye wadumpha malire onse.”
Mose adati, “Ambuye tsekulani chifuwa changa”
“Ndipo pepukitsani ntchito yanga.”
“Masulani lilime langa ku chibwibwi.”
“Kuti anthu azindikire zonena zanga.”
“Ndipo ndisankhileni munthu wondithandiza kuchokera ku banja langa.”
“Aroni m’bale wanga.”
“Onjezereni mphamvu zanga ndi iye.”
“Ndipo muloleni nayenso kugwira ntchito yanga.”
“Kuti tizikulemekezani kwambiri.”
“Ndi kukukumbukirani kwambiri.”
“Ndithudi! Inu muli kutiona nthawi zonse.”
Mulungu adati, “Pempho lako lalandiridwa, iwe Mose.”
“Ndithudi Ife tidakuonetsa chifundo chathu nthawi ina.”
“Pamene tidawauza Amayi ako mawu athu.”

Ponena kuti, “Ika mwana wako m’bokosi ndipo umuponye mu mtsinje ndipo mtsinje udzamulavula iye pa mtunda ndipo adzatoledwa ndi mdani wanga ndiponso ndi mdani wake. Ndipo Ine ndidaonetsa chikondi changa pa iwe kuti uleredwa moyang’aniridwa ndi Ine.”

“Ndipo pamene mlongo wako adapita kwa iwo ndi kunena kuti, Kodi ndikusonyezeni Mayi amene akhoza kumusamala iye? M’menemo ndi mmene tidakubwezera kwa Amayi ako kuti mtima wawo ukhoza kukhazikika ndipo kuti asakhumudwe. Ndipo pamene iwe udapha munthu, Ife tidakupulumutsa ku mavuto ako, ndipo tidakuyesa ndi mayeso ena. Iwe udakhala pakati pa anthu a ku Midiyani zaka zambiri ndipo pomaliza, iwe Mose, udabwera kuno monga momwe zidakonzedwera.”
“Ine ndakusankha iwe kuti unditumikire Ine.”
“Pita iwe ndi m’bale wako ndi zizindikiro zanga ndipo musatope pondikumbukira Ine.”
“Pitani, nonsenu, kwa Farawo yemwe wadumpha malire.”
“Ndipo mukayankhule naye ndi mawu oleza kuti mwina akhoza kumva chenjezo kapena kuopa Mulungu.”
Iwo adati, “Ambuye wathu! Ndithudi! Ife tiopa kuti abweretsa chilango chake msanga kapena achita zoipa zambiri kwa ife.”
Iye adati, “Musaope! Ndithudi! Ine ndili pamodzi ndi inu. Ine ndimamva zonse ndipo ndimaona.”

“Motero pitani nonse kwa iye ndipo mukati, ‘Ndithudi ife ndife Atumwi Ambuye wako motero aleke ana a Israyeli kuti apite ndi ife ndipo usawazunzenso ayi. Ndithudi ife takubweretsera zizindikiro zochokera kwa Ambuye wako! Ndipo mtendere udzakhala kwa iye amene atsatira langizo.”
“Ndithudi zavumbulutsidwa kwa ife kuti chilango chake chidzagwa pa iye amene amakana zizindikiro zake ndipo sazimvera ayi.”
Farawo adati, “Kodi Mose, Ambuye wanu ndani?”
Iye adati, “Ambuye wathu ndiye amene adapereka maonekedwe osiyanasiyana ku zolengedwa zake ndipo adazilangiza bwinobwino.”
Farawo adati, “Nanga zinali bwanji ndi anthu a masiku akale?”
Iye adati, “Ambuye wanga yekha ndiye amene adziwa zimenezo ndipo zidalembedwa mu Buku lake. Iye salakwa ndiponso saiwala.”
Amene adakupangirani dziko lapansi kukhala ngati kama ndipo adakhazikitsa njira zoti inu muziyendamo ndipo watumiza mvula kuchokera kumwamba. Ndipo ameretsa ndi iyo mitundu yosiyanasiyana ya mbewu
Idyani ndiponso dyetsani ziweto zanu. Ndithudi muzimenezi muli zizindikiro kwa anthu ozindikira
